title: Flashlight with Shake
description: Access the flashlight of your device through this app, which gives you the ability to control your device's flash through a shake.

title: Mars Weather
description: App to get the latest weather reports from the Red planet, with data from Insight, Curiosity and Perseverance rovers.

title: URL Shortener
description: App to Shorten down large links using multiple shortening services and share URL's as simple QR codes.

title: Create Ascii
description: Simple python module for creating cool ascii effects from images

title: Digit Recognizer
description: Webapp that recognizes handwritten digits using tfjs
